title: Three-Dim Dynamics
description: Three-dimensional rigid body dynamics; Newton-Euler methods, inertia properties and principal axes; Euler equations, gyroscopic effects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
